class lazyft.hyperopt.runner.HyperoptRunner(command: HyperoptCommand, autosave=False, notify: bool = True, verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: Runner

execute(background=False, load_strategy=False)[source]¶

Executes the Hyperopt command.

Parameters:

  • background – If True, the command will be executed in the background.

  • load_strategy – If True, the strategy will be loaded from the database using the hyperopt ID.

generate_report()[source]¶

Creates a report that can saved later on.

Get the report for a specific epoch.

Parameters:

epoch – The epoch to get the report for.

Returns:

The report for the epoch.

Scrapes the hyperopt epoch information using regex and returns a DataFrame

property report: HyperoptReport¶
save(epoch=None, tag=None) → HyperoptReport[source]¶

Save the the hyperopt result to the database.

Parameters:

  • epoch – An optional epoch to save. If None, the best epoch is used. This epoch will have 1 subtracted from it.

  • tag – An optional tag to save.

Returns:

The saved report
